about.purpose: Farmers often face challenges like crop diseases, unpredictable weather, wrong fertilizer use, and lack of market knowledge. Traditional support is slow and not always available. This app acts as a 24/7 smart assistant, giving the right advice at the right time. It helps increase crop yield, reduce losses, save money, and support modern, sustainable farming practices.
about.aim: To use technology in a simple and practical way so that even small farmers in villages can benefit. The ultimate goal is to make farming smarter, easier, and more profitable, contributing to rural development and food security.
